WorkItem.Description:
Is it possible to drag and drop data from a C#/.NET application to Excel? Can you provide sample code to perform this?
More Info:
The drop target is Excel (or Word) and the drop source is a C# application. In detail we would like to know how can the DataObject looks like â€“ and if we can only drop strings or numbers or if we can also drop objects like tables or charts. How can this be achieved and would it be possible to have a sample project which demonstrates this?
WorkItem.Summary: Drag & Drop from C#/.NET application to Excel

Comments.Message:
Hello Jialiang,

Thank you for using our free Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Request Service!   

Your sample request is about how to drag and drop data from C#/.NET application to Excel.  If I misunderstood your requirement, please feel free to let me know. 

Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Team is triaging the sample topic.  I will keep you updated about the progress every week.  Please also understand that the free Sample Request Service is not for urgent sample requests.   If your request is urgent, please use Microsoft Professional Advisory Services.

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
